title: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content:
Hey can someone send me keen 5 CGA or just the CGA file

and the exe so I can make a patch?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content:
hmm, im not an expert when it comes to keen versions, but i don't think there ever was a CGA of keen 5.

Would be cool though.

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content:
I've never seen one...Szevvy Forever!

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content: There is a Keen 5 CGA and it was being sold until 1997, when Apogee decided to discontinue it due to bad sales. Originally it sold quite well so it shouldn't be that rare, but it seems like noone of the forum visitors seem to have it.

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content:
Didn't iD make Goodbye Galaxy in CGA first?

Edit:

" Keens 4-6 were also created as CGA versions. All of the 7 Keen games out there are EGA titles, and Keens 4-6 also had a separate additional CGA version produced."

From:
[url=http://www.3drealms.com/keenhistory/keenhistory2.html]www.3drealms.com/keenhist...tory2.html[/url]

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content: No, it was primarily developed in EGA, but CGA version were produced of Keen 4-6 and maybe even Keen Dreams.

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content: Hey if you play keen 4 CGA, press F1 and go to order, you can see pictures of what keen 5 CGA would look like.

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content: Im guessing its just a normal EGA screenshot being displayed as CGA.

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content: I doubt it, at least the Keen 6 CGA screenshot seems correct so I'm quite sure it is what the game looked a like.

title: Re: Wheres keen 5 CGA?
content:
Bringing 16 colours down to just about 4 using a standard conversion scheme/substitution table/something probably wouldn't make the game look very good, potentially getting large areas of one colour, or sprites barely visible or recognisable.
It'd be a lot better if every sprite and tile was redrawn with the CGA palette.
So... I'm sure the screenshots are of an actual K5 game.
Actually I'm not sure, but it pretty much has to be the case. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
